214105.en:
"Made Island's springtime, and Mereade await you!", said a mysterious voice, but, ummm, I must've misheard...
Oops, that was bad. I totally forgot the "Madam" Mereade part......

222102.en:
I was on my way to deliver a package to Made Isle when my boat was wrecked in a storm and washed up on this island. Even if Made Isle is
close to here, it's across the sea. You can't get there without a boat. If I could fly, I wouldn't have to think about boats.
222102.ja:

223779.en:
How silly I was to try to use the guidelines as a guide in the midst of a crisis that could have cost me my life. I often reminded my
daughter that it is she who decides the guidelines of life. These children will be the next generation.

223781.en:
No matter what kind of disaster happened, as long as we had the desire to deliver good products for our customers, we never lost our
way as a shop.

223783.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Thanks to the loss of the guidelines, I have
realized what is important. I will continue to
work hard in my Shop duties.

223785.en:
We've had so many disasters recently that we decided that we couldn't rely on the military alone, so we decided to form a volunteer
neighborhood watch group.

223787.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Of course, I will participate! I did 10 laps
of Kimbel to get in shape. I worked up a good
sweat.

223789.en:
Lately here at the Tavern, there's been no shortage of drinking topics, from rumors of missing meteorites to the saga of the black
monster slayer. Even though the guidelines are no longer updated, there are still a lot of good-natured people in this town. Well, let's
drink again today!
223789.ja:

223791.en:
Esha's still not feeling the tension. Well, I'm glad he survived. We want to support each other. We were talking about how we can use
our experience to support other races if they come to our country.

223793.en:
! I'm so glad you are safe. I was afraid that you would be gone too. Me and Zagulf survived.I thought over and over again
about following Master Quard. But I think we have something to do in Royal City, which Mr. Quard risked his life to protect. That's what
I'm thinking now.

223795.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>I wonder if the Relay Gate is still not fixed.
If the gate isn't working, we won't be able to
get to him.

223797.en:
Come on, come on! How about some fresh flowers?We have a wide variety of colorful flowers grown freely in the rich water of
Ethene. There is no guideline for which flowers to buy, you are free to choose the one you like best. We recommend the alchemy blue
roses!

223799.en:
The sailor there said that the wind had changed direction and he was leaving Greater Ethene. I don't know about the direction of
the wind, but the color of the sky has changed a lot. Anyway...
223799.ja:
ã€Œãã“ã«ã„ãŸã€€èˆ¹ä¹—ã‚Šã®ãŠå…„ã•ã‚“ãªã‚‰ ã€€é¢¨å‘ããŒå¤‰ã‚ã£ãŸã¨ã‹ã€€è¨€ã„ã ã—ã¦ ã€€å¤§ã‚¨ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒå³¶ã‹ã‚‰ã€€æ—…ç«‹ã£ã¦ã„ã£ãŸã‚ã‚ˆã€‚

223801.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Even without the Time Guidebook, I decided to
serve God of my own volition. Now<bw_break>

223803.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Royal Alchemia has disappeared and many
alchemists have gone missing. If nothing is
done, the country's power will decline.<bw_break>

223805.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>That is why we, the alchemists of the Royal
City, must help His Majesty Quard from now on.
Will the royal palace be rebuilt?

223807.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>We were able to get through an unprecedented
crisis without relying on the guidelines. I
feel a little more confident as a soldier.

223809.en:
Hey there, travelers! I'm a Kimbel expert and I'm here to give you some good information about Royal City. I'd like to say, but so many
things have happened that I'm still gathering information from Abangiardo. Please give me a call again!

223811.en:
Earthquakes, meteorites, the appearance of monsters, and several crises seem to have brought change to the people of Royal City.
Now they act spontaneously, each with his or her own ideas. What kind of future awaits us when we make choices that do not rely on
guidelines?

223813.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>The guidance of the guidelines is gone, but
now we can protect the Ethene Kingdom! Somehow
I feel that way!<bw_break>

223815.en:
When I said that, I was lectured by my master, Gandak-sama, not to let a novice get carried away. I want to become a full-fledged
alchemist as soon as possible!

223817.en:
Beyond this gate is Tiplone Highlands. If you want to go to Freedom Village, you should go up the mountain to the east. However, it is
said that most of the people there have already disappeared. For more information, please contact Mr. Wagmika.

223819.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Oh, look at the Eternal Ring. The liquid that
should have accumulated in the vessel has
somehow run out, not even a drop.<bw_break>

223821.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Life without a written guide is totally
unpredictable. I can't wait to see what will
happen next.

223823.en:
We moved to Ethene Kingdom because of the Time Guidebook, but the guidelines were not updated and a meteorite fell on us. Even so, I never
thought of going back to Wena. I can't abandon Deguado.

223825.en:
If I stay here, I can make tea for Master Linka when he gets thirsty. Yes, I'm a competent butler! I have dozens of different
kinds of tea leaves all ready to go! Ah, Linka-sama~! Please make my throat dry quickly!

223827.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>The palace disappeared, a meteorite fell, and
many times I thought it was over, but Nancy
never gave up.<bw_break>

223829.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>That's why I won't give up. I'm going to stay
strong and become a man who can protect Nancy!

223831.en:
They could have at least sent me a piece of news after they left. Well, however, it is said that not hearing from them is a sign that
they are well. I'll always be waiting for them.
223831.ja:
ã€Œã¾ã£ãŸãã€€ã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ„ã‚‰ã‚â€¦â€¦ ã€€æ—…ç«‹ã£ãŸå¾Œã«ã€€ä¾¿ã‚Šã®ã²ã¨ã¤ãã‚‰ã„ ã€€ã‚ˆã“ã—ã¦ã‚‚ã€€ã„ã„ã ã‚ã†ã«ã€‚

223833.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>There is an open world that begins with a
misunderstanding. I dare not stop.

223835.en:
Life without meteorites feels good! The earthquakes are over and the monsters are down. I'm gonna have to drink to celebrate,
Hiccup!

223837.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>His Majesty Quard is at Army Headquarters. It
should be finished by now, but I wonder if the
wound was deeper than expected.

223839.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Oh, God. Please watch over us as we move
forward into a new era, having overcome this
calamity.

223841.en:
Who's going to live in this house next? Since we've defended it all this way, it won't be worth it if someone important doesn't live in
it!

223843.en:
At one point I was wondering what was going to happen, but I'm glad I believed in His Majesty Quard! I'm sure I can do my best from now on
with her!

223845.en:
My great-grandmother used to say. The Book of Guidelines gives us advice, but it is not an order or a rule. And yet, as time went on,
people began to mistakenly believe that the handbook was their destiny. It's the weakness of the human mind, isn't it?

223847.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Whatever the case may be, my grandson must set
an example as an Ethene of the new era. I will
be guiding him vigorously from now on!

223849.en:
My old job companion worked as a soldier in the royal court, but he's been missing for a long time. I wonder if I should just give up
now.

223851.en:
Now that things have finally settled down in Royal City, I'm thinking of re-opening the Sho at the Tavern. All the dancers are itching to
get back into it! Shante wanted to sing too. I can't refuse if they ask me like that. Oh, well, anyway...

223853.en:
Papa told me to write a book on the history of time in a book, so I did. Then I'll read it! Weather is fine. Mom is working. Papa is
worried about his flabby tummy. Moni likes a flabby tummy!
223853.ja:
ã€Œãƒ‘ãƒ‘ãŒã­ã€€ã¨ãã®ã—ã—ã‚“ã—ã‚‡ã¯ ã€€ã«ã£ãã«ã§ã‚‚ã€€ã—ãªã•ã„ã£ã¦ã„ã†ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ã‹ã„ãŸã‚ˆã€‚ã˜ã‚ƒã‚ã€€ã‚ˆã‚€ã­ï¼
ã€Œã¦ã‚“ãã€€ã¯ã‚Œã€‚ãƒãƒã¯ã€€ãŠã—ã”ã¨ã€‚ ã€€ãƒ‘ãƒ‘ã¯ã€€ã½ã£ã“ã‚ŠãŠãªã‹ã€€ãã«ã—ã¦ã‚‹ã€‚ ã€€ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‹ã¯ã€€ã½ã£ã“ã‚Šã€€ã ã„ã™ãã ã‚ˆï¼

223855.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Heh heh heh. Didn't I do that well? My mom and
dad both praised me!

223857.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Gandak and Hollis here were also talking about
how we haven't been out of Greater Ethene
since we were born.<bw_break>

223859.en:
Of course it's important to practice alchemy, but it's also good to go on a trip to broaden your horizons. I'll ask my grandma about it
next time!

223861.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Without the guidelines, I was so anxious, but
I'm alive today, and surprisingly, things are
going to be all right.<bw_break>

223863.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Life is dazzlingly rosy without guidance. With
Kimbel's booze and drinking companionship! Ha-
ha-ha! Let's enjoy the moment!

223865.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>It was written in the Time Guidebook a long
time ago.If you don't give up, your dreams
will come true! I still believe that.<bw_break>

223867.en:
I'm going to become the most amazing female alchemist and make the best medicine to help Jose who has a weak body. I will definitely
make my dream come true!

223869.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>I was thinking about the Alchemy Pot prism
design, and it was soooo noisy outside, so I
closed the windows and put my ear buds in!<bw_break>

223871.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>I'm so relieved that it finally became quiet.
Was there a festival going on? Well, now I can
finally concentrate!

223873.en:
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! Listen, YOU! Royal Alchemia is gone and there's a shortage of alchemists! This is your chance to make it
big! I'll become an alchemist and turn stones into gold to help the treasury of Ethene Kingdom!

223875.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I've been scared since the sky changed color.
I've been shivering inside the house with my
mom, but I think we're okay now, don't you?<bw_break>

223877.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>I think I'll go on a little trip. If we take a
boat out for a short break, we can enjoy the
vacation mood!

223879.en:
Please leave me alone. I'm blue right now. I'm thinking about my life. I've lost my guidebook, I've lost my purpose in life, and
I'm filled with a sense of hopelessness. I feel like writing a poem.

223881.en:
Oh, hey! I remember you. You helped me find Ondian when Mikhail was in a slump, right? Oh, Mikhail's not here. I don't think he's coming
back. After the meteorite hit, he said he wanted to see Ondian one last time before he died, and that's the last time he saw him.
Well, he's probably doing Ichaicha right now, isn't he? I've got enough manuscripts to start working on a book of poems at last.

223883.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>This will be a successful book of poems.
Mikhail's fame will soar in the Royal City.
You can look forward to it!

223885.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><pc>! I'm so glad to see you. I
thought it was the end of the world for a
while, but I managed to persevere.<bw_break>

223887.en:
Compared to when you first came to this store, a lot has changed. The guidelines are gone, and it's like a different world. Well, no
matter what kind of world it is, I'll just use the alchemy I inherited from my father to protect Shante and this store!
223887.ja:
ã€Œã¯ã˜ã‚ã¦ã€€ãŠå‰ãŒã€€ã“ã®åº—ã«æ¥ãŸé ƒã« ã€€æ¯”ã¹ã‚‹ã¨ã€€ã„ã‚ã„ã‚ã€€å¤‰ã‚ã£ãŸãªã€‚ ã€€æŒ‡é‡ã‚‚ãªããªã£ãŸã—ã€€ã¾ã‚‹ã§ã€€åˆ¥ä¸–ç•Œã â€¦â€¦ã€‚

223889.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Many things have happened, but I still love
this Royal City! I can show you around if you
like.<bw_break>

223891.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>But today I feel like going out with my good
friends. I'm sorry, but I'll see you next
time. Ugh.

223893.en:
Yikes. I'm a recluse, but I'm sensing something strange happening to Greater Ethene. Hey, you. Where am I? No, you don't have to
answer after all. True fruit is only valuable when you discover it for yourself. You know why I came out here, don't you? I'm sure that
true fruit is something you'd miss if you were cooped up in your room!
223893.ja:
ã€Œã‚¤ãƒ’ãƒƒã€‚åƒ•ã¯ã€€å¼•ãã“ã‚‚ã‚Šã ã‘ã© ã€€å¤§ã‚¨ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒå³¶ã«èµ·ããŸã€€ç•°å¤‰ã‚’æ„Ÿã˜ã¦ã‚‹ã€‚ ã€€ã­ãˆã€€å›ã€‚ã“ã“ã¯ã€€ã©ã“ãªã‚“ã ã„ï¼Ÿ

223895.en:
I want to cherish the everyday things that I take for granted, like gazing at the waterway on my way home from shopping. I sincerely
believe that now.

223897.en:
Listen, listen! When the Hexabeasts showed up in Royal City, I sang a song, didn't I? And the people who heard me
sing asked me if I wanted to join the Neighborhood Watch. This means...

223899.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>I should sing a song to soothe the weary
vigilantes, right? Of course. I'll sing with
all my heart!

223901.en: No one seems to be inside.

223903.en:
Now that things have finally settled down in Royal City, I'd like to resume picking wild vegetables in the Tiplone Highlands. Fresh
ingredients are the key to cooking and refining food! Maybe I should take Luon with me. What a whim that little brat has taken to
going out of his room!

223905.en:
This is Royal City Kimbel, which has entered a new era. The people of Ethene Kingdom have broken away from the Time Guidebook and live
according to their own hearts. No matter how many times they are exposed to crisis, they will face the difficulties believing in their
own power.

223907.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Welcome! Zef's store is a zesan eigashu! Zef's
shop is a zeppon eigyouchuu! I'll make
everyone fall in love with me! Mwah!

223909.en:
Me, me, me! When I'm big, I'm going to go around the world on a boat! Then maybe I'll meet the little boy whose mouth is called "Cu-
cu-cu" again! Cu-cu-cu-cu~!

223911.en:
Thank goodness ! I was sure he was alive, but I didn't feel safe until I saw his face. I'm not sure if the people in Royal
City are aware of it yet, but the smell of the wind, the color of the air, everything has changed. It's as if we've arrived in a new
world. What in the world happened?
223911.ja:
ã€Œã‚ˆã‚ˆâ€¦ã‚ˆã‹ã£ãŸã€€ã•ã‚“ï¼ ã€€å¿…ãšã€€ç”Ÿãã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ã€€ä¿¡ã˜ã¦ã„ãŸã‘ã© ã€€ã‹â€¦ã‚«ã‚ªã‚’è¦‹ã‚‹ã¾ã§ã¯ã€€å®‰å¿ƒã§ããªãã¦ã€‚
ã€ŒãŠâ€¦ç‹éƒ½ã®äººã¯ã€€ã¾ã ã€€ã‚ã¾ã‚Š ã€€ãããâ€¦æ°—ã¥ã„ã¦ãªã„ã€€ã¿ãŸã„ã ã‘ã© ã€€é¢¨ã®åŒ‚ã„ã€€ç©ºæ°—ã®è‰²â€¦â€¦ã™ã¹ã¦ãŒå¤‰ã‚ã£ãŸã€‚
ã€Œã¾ã‚‹ã§ã€€ã‚ã‚ã‚â€¦æ–°ã—ã„ä¸–ç•Œã« ã€€ã‚„ã£ã¦ãã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã€€ã¿ã¿â€¦ã¿ãŸã„ã ã€‚ ã€€ã„ã„ã„â€¦ã„ã£ãŸã„ã€€ä½•ãŒèµ·ããŸã‚“ã ã‚ã†ï¼Ÿ

223913.en:
You are welcome . We've had our share of hardships, but somehow we all seem to be able to keep the store open. I don't know
the true nature of the cataclysms that have befallen this country, but I am confident that your work has averted disaster and led to a
better future for all of us. As a citizen of Ethene, I would like to thank Your Majesty, Mereade, and most of all you, for this great
accomplishment.

223915.en:
Well... I can only chat with you if you come in here, but if that's okay, you're welcome to do so. Now that the crisis in Royal City is
over, I've decided to let the magical creatures leave the room and spend their time freely. Chularis is already having a blast.
While I was serving him, he climbed on my head and hid his face with his big tail.

223917.en:
I was on my way to deliver a package to Made Isle when my ship was wrecked in a storm and washed up on this island. If I could fly, I
wouldn't have to think about the ship. I don't know what I'm going to do now.
223917.ja:
ã€Œã‚ªãƒ¬ã¯ã€€ãƒãƒ‡å³¶ã¸ã€€è·ç‰©ã‚’å±Šã‘ã«ã„ã ã€€é€”ä¸­ã ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã€€åµã§èˆ¹ãŒé›£ç ´ã—ã¦ ã€€ã“ã®å³¶ã«ã€€æ‰“ã¡ã‚ã’ã‚‰ã‚Œã¡ã¾ã£ã¦ã•ãã€‚
ã€Œã‚ãƒ¼ã‚â€¦â€¦ç©ºã§ã‚‚é£›ã¹ã‚Šã‚ƒã€€èˆ¹ãŒã©ã†ã¨ã‹ ã€€è€ƒãˆãªãã¦ã‚‚ã€€ã„ã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã©ãªãã€‚ ã€€ã“ã‚Œã‹ã‚‰ã€€ã©ã†ã™ã£ã‹ãªãã€‚

223919.en:
Yo, traveler! Listen up! Kimbel, the man who knows Kimbel, just found out the Abangiard scoop! I used my Abangiard connections to get
on a patrol boat in the Lendersia Inland Sea, near the maritime city of Rinjahar.

223921.en:
Everywhere was in a state of decay, as if thousands of years had passed! There were monsters I've never seen before! Rinjahal was
destroyed by a disaster only a year ago, remember? I'm sensing an Abangiardian mystery here!

223923.en:
With the palace gone, we won't be able to see the time, and the guidelines will probably never be updated again. It's disturbing not
knowing what the future holds for our children.

223925.en:
From now on, instead of writing guidelines, I, as a parent, must listen carefully to what she wants to do and what her dreams are for the
future.

223927.en:
The meteorite was gone, so I took a boat out to get away from it all, and I saw this little island off to the east. I just sort of stopped
by.

223929.en:
Nalbia, I think it's called. When I introduced myself to the townspeople as being from the Ethene Kingdom, they didn't quite
understand what I was saying. The chief of Ethene Village asked me how I was. No, no, Ethene is not a village! Ah. By any chance,
are you the one who was teased?

223931.en:
Listen to this! Mereade-sama came to the store for the first time in a while and bought some cat goods! Even though he's so busy. No, no,
no! I guess it's because he's so busy that he needs the ultimate comfort of cats!

225992.en:
The palace disappeared, a meteorite fell, and many times I thought it was over, but Nancy never gave up. So I won't give up either. I'm
going to become a soldier in the service of the kingdom to protect Nancy!
225992.ja:

225994.en:
Jose, one of my classmates, wants to become a soldier in the service of the kingdom. I had given up on it because I was too weak and the
Time Guidebook said I wasn't cut out for it, but now that the Guidebook is no longer updated and everyone is trying to live by
their own will, Jose has decided to follow his dream too. It was written in the guidebook a long time ago. If you don't give up, your
dreams will come true! I'm going to become a Tobikoii female alchemist like Linka one day. I'm the future alchemist and I'm going to
create the perfect weapon for Jose! I'd like you to help me with this, sister.Jose, one of my classmates, wants to become a soldier in the service of the kingdom. I had given up on it because I was too weak and the
Time Guidebook said I wasn't cut out for it, but now that the Guidebook is no longer updated and everyone is trying to live by
their own will, Jose has decided to follow his dream too. It was written in the guidebook a long time ago. If you don't give up, your
dreams will come true! I'm going to become a Tobikoii female alchemist like Linka one day. I, the future alchemist, am going to create
the perfect weapon for Jose! I'd like you to help me with this, if you don't mind.

225996.en:
Thank you! I think the weapon Jose is going to smelt should be a light and strong dagger, so that he can handle it easily. For this
alchemy, I need the Phantom Thorn that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> drops, so can you go get it for me? I think <%sev_que_name0> is in Ethene
Kingdom Area or something. Please do me a favor!

225998.en:
<if_woman>Thank you! It seems like you have a lot of
work to do! I hope you'll come back after
you've cleaned up a bit.<else>Thank you! It seems like you have a lot of
work to do! I hope you'll come back after
you've cleaned up a bit.<endif>

226000.en:
You say it's reckless and we should stop them. I'm sure if there is an update of the guidelines, it will say so. But I want to
support Jose. I hope you'll reconsider.

226002.en:
<if_woman>As a future alchemist, I'm going to create the
perfect weapon for Jose! Would you like to
help me with this, sister?<open_irai><bw_break><else>As a future alchemist, I'm going to create the
perfect weapon for Jose! If you want to help
me, big brother, I'd be happy to help you.<open_irai><bw_break><endif>

226004.en:
I think that the weapon that Jose is going to smelt should be a light and strong dagger so that he can handle it easily. For this
alchemy, we need the Phantom Thorn that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> drops, so can you go get it for us? I think <%sev_que_name0> is in Ethene
Kingdom Area or something. Please do me a favor!

226006.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Wow! It's really light! Even I can handle
this! Thank you, Nancy! We'll have to get
ready to take on the enemy right away!

226008.en:
<if_woman>Oh, sister! Did you get the Phantom Thorn?<else>Oh, brother! Did you get the Phantom Thorn by
any chance?<endif>

226010.en:
It's an essential ingredient in making the
perfect weapon for Jose. Please take care of
it!

226012.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Thank you! My alchemy skills are not quite
there yet, but I'm sure I'll succeed!

226014.en: <attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>It's done! A light and sturdy dagger is ready!<me 71>

226016.en:
Jose, here you go! With this, Hexabeast is a
piece of cake!

226018.en:
I'm glad you are pleased! But I wonder if Jose will really be okay on his own. There are rumors that survivors of the Hexabeast are
hiding in the depths of the Echoing Sea Cave. I want them to send in a strike force as soon as possible, but I haven't heard anything
about any damage, and the military seems to be too busy with other things. Then Jose said he's going to go out there and take it down
himself. Hey, why don't you head for the Echoing Sea Cave too? Jose, I'm too scared to go alone. Echoing Sea Cave is southeast of the
Ethene Kingdom Area. Please!I'm glad you are pleased! But I wonder if Jose will really be okay on his own. There are rumors that survivors of the Hexabeast are
hiding in the depths of the Echoing Sea Cave. I want them to send in a strike force as soon as possible, but I haven't heard anything
about any damage, and the military seems to be too busy with other things to make any moves. Then Jose said he's going to go out there and
take down the enemy himself. Can't you go deep into the Echoing Sea Cave, too? Jose, I'm too scared to go alone. Echoing Sea Cave is
southeast of the Ethene Kingdom Area. Please!

226020.en: Would you like to give Phantom Thorn to Nancy?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

226024.en:
Nancy took out the Alchemy Pot, put in the
Phantom Thorn, and threw in ingredients at
random.

226026.en:
The Alchemy Pot began to emit a brilliant
light.

226030.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Nancy is amazing to be able to create such a
lightweight dagger! Even I can handle this!
I've got to get ready to take down this thing!

226032.en: Jose is going to take down Hexabeast.<open_irai><bw_break>

226034.en:
I'm worried about you alone, so why don't you and your sister head to the depths of Echoing Sea Cave? Echoing Sea Cave is southeast of
Ethene Kingdom Area. Please!I'm worried about you alone, so why don't you and your brother head to the depths of Echoing Sea Cave? Echoing Sea Cave is southeast of
Ethene Kingdom Area. Please!

226036.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>Ugh. I can't believe I'm in such bad shape at
a time like this. Gohoho, gohoho.

226038.en:
I've heard the stories. Is it true that you
took custody of a weakened Hexabeast?<open_irai><bw_break>

226040.en:
Jose got sick after leaving Hexabeast with Linka, so he came back. I'll try to make a good medicine with alchemy. Can you visit Mr.
Linka at Zef's Shop and check on Hexabeast?Jose got sick after leaving Hexabeast with Linka, so he came back. I'll try to make a good medicine with alchemy. Would you please
visit Mr. Linka at Zef's Shop and check on Hexabeast?

226042.en:
I've been waiting for you. Jose came by a little while ago. The Hexabeast is in our custody. He looked a little weak, but I
gave him some medicine for magical creatures and he came back to life. I'm sure he's fine now. I heard rumors that there was a survivor
of Hexabeast, but I never thought he was that small. Oh, and Jose got sick, so I sent him home first. He seems to be taking care of
Hexabeast, but I can't leave him in this town, no matter how small he is. Hexabeast is still a magical creature just like Joneal and the
others. I wish I could do something about it.

226044.en:
It's true that the number of people there has
been drastically decreasing.

226046.en:
Zef is right, this might be the perfect place for him. Could you go to Freedom Village and ask someone named Wagmika to put
Hexabeast there? I'll talk to Jose about it!
226046.ja:

226050.en:
Linka, there may be a way for that Hexabeast
to live in Freedom Village. Why don't you talk
to Wagmika?

226052.en:
Jose, you just have to be patient. You will be
better when the medicine is ready.

226054.en:
Oh, sister. You went to check on Hexabeast. How was it? I see! You're back on your feet, huh? What? You decided to visit Wagmika at
Freedom Village?Oh, my brother. You went to check on Hexabeast. How did it go? I see! You're back on your feet, aren't you? What? You decided to
visit Wagmika at Freedom Village?

I'm praying too that they will take that
Hexabeast back!

226058.en:
<pc> Could you go to Freedom
Village and ask someone named Wagmika to drop
it off? I'll talk to Jose about it!

226060.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I'm sorry I went to the trouble of making it
for you!

226062.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I am also physically weak, so I just couldn't
leave him alone. As written in the guidelines,
I wasn't suited to be a soldier after all.

226064.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Thank you, Nancy, but protecting Hexabeast
doesn't qualify me to serve the Kingdom. I'm
giving up my dream of becoming a soldier.

226066.en:
Don't worry. I'm happy with the way things turned out! I realized that life is a series of choices. Life is a series of choices. If I
become a soldier, I will have to make choices as a soldier. But I want to make choices that follow my heart! Like the sister who saved me
and that Hexabeast!Don't worry. I'm happy with the way things turned out! I realized that life is a series of choices. Life is a series of choices. If I
become a soldier, I will have to make choices as a soldier. But I want to make choices that follow my heart! Like the brother who saved me
and Hexabeast!

226068.en:
<if_woman><attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Thank you, sister! I'm sure he will be able to
live comfortably in Freedom Village!<else><attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Thank you, brother! I'm sure he will be able
to live comfortably in Freedom Village!<endif>

226070.en:
<if_woman>Oh, sister! I heard from Jose. I heard from
Jose that they took back that Hexabeast!<bw_break><else>Oh, brother! I heard from Jose. I heard from
Jose that they took back the Hexabeast!<bw_break><endif>

226072.en:
Jose was so sick, but as soon as he took the medicine I made, he ran away. And when he came back, he gave away the dagger! It's awful,
isn't it?

226074.en:
That's enough. It's just like Jose to save the
Hexabeast.

226076.en:
That's not true! Even soldiers need to be
kind!

226080.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Jose. yes! Yes, I agree! I'll keep supporting
Jose!

226082.en:
<if_woman>Thank you for hanging out with us, sister.
Here, take this as a thank you!<else>Thank you for hanging out with us, big
brother. Take this as a thank you!<endif>

226084.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I'll try my best to study alchemy so that I
won't lose to Jose!

226086.en:
I wanted to become a soldier to protect Nancy, but I've caused her trouble. I gave up my dream of becoming a soldier, but even if I
don't become a soldier, I can still protect Nancy, right? I'm going to follow my heart and make my own choices! Just like your sister!I wanted to become a soldier to protect Nancy, but I've caused her trouble. I gave up my dream of becoming a soldier, but even if I
don't become a soldier, I can still protect Nancy, right? I'm going to follow my heart and make my own choices! Just like your brother!

so that I won't lose to Jose!<else><attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Thank you for taking the time to hang out with
us, brother. I'll try my best to study alchemy

226246.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>I was surprised to find such a big city in the
inland sea of Lendersia.

226248.en:
Oh, yeah? You're dressed differently from the others in town, aren't you? Are you an adventurer or something? A big city on a
strange island.

226250.en:
I was on my way to deliver a package to the monastery in Made Isle when a storm wrecked my boat and I was washed up on this strange
island. Even if Made Isle is close from here, it's still across the sea. If we lose the ship, we'll never get there. If only I could
fly, I could go there at once.

229432.en:
Nice to meet you! My name is Himeuzu, and I am a new Paper Shop employee. This is my first time working here, and I'm very nervous, but
I'm learning a lot from Itokuri senior staff, and I hope to do my job well! By the way, I didn't know there was such a big island in
Lendersia! I was so surprised. Well then...

229434.en:
The handmade paper that has been handed down to us at Elf is durable, long lasting, beautiful, warm and very wonderful! It is
beautiful, warm and very wonderful! We have a new Paper Shop staff, Himeuzu, who came all the way from Greater Ethene across the sea to
the Post Office here in Royal City Kimbel. Himeuzu is still very inexperienced, but he has the same aspiration as me to spread the
wonderfulness of paper all over the world through letter paper. As a senior, I will work hard to pass on the traditional techniques
with her without being arrogant!

229436.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Thank you very much! By the way, you have a
visitor. I know this is sudden, but could you
do me a favor?<yesno><break>

229438.en: <attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Too bad. We look forward to seeing you again!

229440.en:
Wow, I'm so happy! I'd like to make a request regarding the new letter paper we are planning to sell here at the Post Office. I am a
newcomer to the Paper Shop, so I asked the people of Royal City what kind of letter paper they would like me to make. And they all
talked about Mr. Mereade without fail. I thought she was a charming person who was loved by everyone! I would love to use that
image as a motif! I heard that Mr. Mereade is working for the country at the Army Headquarters in Royal City Kimbel. So, could
you please take a photo of Mr. Mereade? Of course, we will give you the finished letter!

229442.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Really? I'm so happy! I'm so happy! Then, I'll
be waiting for it with pleasure!

229444.en:
Really? I did it! What is it? Are you sure you're not taking on too many jobs? That's no good! You're too busy. I'll be waiting for
you, so don't worry! Please come back when you are free!

229446.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Hmmm, too bad. Please come back if you change
your mind!

229448.en:
Thank you very much! And, dear customer, don't
forget your promise to get Mereade's copy of
True.<open_irai><bw_break>

229450.en:
I am a copy of Mr. Mereade's photo-true at the Army Headquarters in Royal City Kimbel, so please don't hesitate to contact me! Thank you
very much!

229452.en:
Ah, you have a visitor! Did you bring what I
asked for by any chance?

229454.en:
Well then, I guess I'll have to buy some
letter paper. Let's see...<bw_break>

229456.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh, no! Mr. Mereade wants you to use this
material? I understand! Then, I'll start
making the letter paper right away!

229458.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Phew! It's amazing! It's a masterpiece! Here
you go, Royal City Kimbel Limited Edition
Local Letter Cards!

229460.en:
The material I received from Mr. Mereade included a portrait of a beautiful sister and brother, which I designed into a bass! I
wasn't sure if I could do it well or not, but Itokuri senior taught me enthusiastically and I was able to make a beautiful letter board!
By the way, there is a legendary Paper Shop that crossed the sea to Ethene Kingdom more than 5000 years ago. His name is also Itokuri!
He must have been a passionate person! Royalty Paper will be sold exclusively at the Post Office as soon as possible! We are looking
forward to seeing you again.

229462.en:
Would you like to give Mereade's Document to
Paper Shop Himeuzu?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

229464.en:
<pc> gave Mereade's Document to Paper
Shop Himeuzu!

229466.en:
The handmade paper that has been handed down to us at Elf is durable, long lasting, beautiful, warm and very wonderful! It is
beautiful, warm and very wonderful! We are very happy to announce that Himeuzu, a new Paper Shop staff member, came all the way from
Greater Ethene across the sea to the Post Office here in Royal City Kimbel. Even though she is a newcomer, Himeuzu is amazing. She
told me about all kinds of things I didn't know about dyes, new materials, and other amazing things! I wonder if I am old-
fashioned! I used to run the Paper Shop here before her arrival, but I'm going to leave the window to Himeuzu and research new paper
making techniques!

230389.en:
You are welcome . We have had our share of hardships, but somehow we all seem to be able to keep the store open. I don't know
the true story of what happened to this country, but I am confident that your work has averted disaster and led to a better future
for all of us. That's why I'm sorry, but since you saved Linka and Shante, there's something I can only ask you to do. Will you help us
save a certain person?But please keep it a secret. Of course, we will be very grateful.
230389.ja:

230391.en:
Thank you . I knew you would take care of it. Now, please go to the house with the locked door on the west side of Royal
City. It is very close to Director Yong's house. If you say "It's time for medicine" at the door, they will let you in. The person you
need to save is on the second floor. I'll be on my way there later, so I'll meet you there. Good bye.

230393.en:
Thank you very much. Just as I expected . It seems you have your hands full with other requests at the moment. When
you are free, could you please send me a new request? I am always here.

230395.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Are you busy, after all? I understand. If you
have some free time, could you give me a call
again?

230397.en:
Well... I can only chat with you if you come in here, but if that's okay, you're welcome to do so. Now that the crisis in Royal City is
over, I've decided to let the magical creatures leave the room and spend their time freely. Chularis is already having a blast.
While I was serving him, he climbed on my head and hid his face with his big tail. Oh, no. No, I mean... I have a favor to ask you. Would
you mind approaching from the front of the counter?
230397.ja:
ã€Œãˆãˆã¨ã€‚ã“ã‚“ãªæ‰€ã¾ã§ã€€å…¥ã£ã¦ã“ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ã‚‚ ã€€é›‘è«‡ã™ã‚‹ãã‚‰ã„ã—ã‹ã€€ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒâ€¦â€¦ ã€€ãã‚Œã§ã‚‚ã‚ˆã‘ã‚Œã°ã€€ãŠå¥½ãã«ã©ã†ãã€‚

230399.en:
What? What are you doing here? What do you want now? I am... I am... Ugh... Get out of here! Kunai, I've already thought of
everything.
230399.ja:
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã²ã£ï¼ ã€€ããâ€¦è²´æ§˜ã¯â€¦â€¦ã£â€¦â€¦ã€‚
ã€Œä»Šã•ã‚‰â€¦â€¦ãªãªã€€ä½•ã®ç”¨ã ã£ï¼ï¼Ÿ ã€€ç§ã¯â€¦â€¦ã‚ã£ã€€ç§ã¯â€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦

230403.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Without guidelines, there is no Value of Life.
It's over. It's all over.

230405.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Ugh. Stop it. Get out. I'm scared, I'm scared,
I'm sick!

230407.en:
You're that guy from back then! That Zef guy. Why did you tell him the password? If you lay a finger on that man upstairs, you will lose
your life.

230409.en:
Damn.You make me sick when I see your face.
Get lost, you pig.

230411.en:
<pipipi_mid>Did that man send you? If you need me, say the
password.

230413.en:
Near the door, set the chat setting to
"Nearby" and say the words that Zef taught
you.

230417.en:
Zef gave Belma a potion, and she gradually
became calmer and quieter.

230419.en:
At Belma's call, Grain and Slaine showed up
<pc> and Zef was chased out of the
house.<se_nots map_common 2>

230421.en:
Welcome!Zef's store is a zeppon eigashitsu! medicine, medicine, magic, everything you need... mmmmmm... Chularis I heard it! I got
a job from Zef! I got a job from Zef!

230423.en:
If you go to the door and say, "It's time for medicine," they will let you in. The person you need to save is upstairs. I'm heading home
later, so I'll meet you there. Good bye.

230425.en:
<pipipi_mid>Here you go <pc>. And Belma. You've
had your usual seizure. Come on, calm down.
It's all right. It's time for your medication.

230427.en:
The sedative worked well. I see that he was a bit agitated by your reunion, perhaps reminiscing about the past. Surprised? Yes.
The person you need to save is herBelma. On the day of the golden execution at Ethene Royal Palace, Belma was seriously wounded by a
gold golem that emerged from the Alchemy Pot. His men escaped from the Royal Palace with Belma.However, they could not rely on Army
Headquarters and had no doctor to treat Belma. So, ironically, the only one who had any idea of what to do came to me, a specialist in
medical alchemy.
230427.ja:
ã€Œé®é™è–¬ãŒã€€ã‚ˆãåŠ¹ãã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ ã€€ã‚ãªãŸã¨å†ä¼šã—ã¦ã€€éå»ã‚’æ€ã„ã ã—ãŸã®ã‹ ã€€å°‘ã—ã€€èˆˆå¥®ã—ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã­ã€‚

230429.en:
The wound is healing well. However, during her escape from the palace, Belma lost her guidebook. Belma believed deeply in her
guidebook.Now that she's lost it, she's locked in her room, living in fear every day. We used to be in great danger because of the guidance
officer. I feel the same way. I'm not a problem at all. Anyway, finding Belma's guidelines will help her regain her composure.
From what my men have told me, it was most likely lost in the Imperial Plaza at the Ethene Royal Palace. But the palace is no
longer there. If this continues, Belma will...
230429.ja:
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã‚­ã‚ºã®æ²»ç™‚ã¯ã€€é †èª¿ã§ã™ã€‚ ã€€ãŸã ã€€ç‹å®®ã‚’è„±å‡ºã™ã‚‹æ™‚ã«ã€€ãƒ™ãƒ«ãƒã•ã‚“ã¯ ã€€è‡ªåˆ†ã®æŒ‡é‡æ›¸ã‚’ã€€ãªãã—ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚“ã§ã™ã‚ˆã€‚

230431.en:
I have orders not to let anyone in the house. Leave. Stay out of this. I owe Zef a debt of gratitude for his treatment, but you are an
enemy who has sabotaged Belma on numerous occasions. I don't trust you. No hard feelings.

230435.en:
I was tightly wrapped by Zef! Don't tell anyone about Belma! I'm still a little nervous about this. Chularis' mouth is harder than a
walnut! You too, have a good day, okay? Please, please, please...

230437.en:
From what I have heard from my staff, it is most likely lost in the Imperial Plaza at the Ethene Royal Palace. If you can get to the
missing Royal Palace. If you do find it, please show it to me. I'll see what I can do about Belma's guidelines from another angle.

230439.en: Would you give Zef the Tattered Guidebook?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

230443.en:
Thanks for your help <pc>. Did you by
any chance find Belma's guidance document?

230445.en:
Oh, it seems I was mistaken. After all, as
expected of <pc>, this request is not
easy.

230447.en:
Oh, my God! I knew from the very first day we met that you were not an ordinary person, but you are indeed . I have
identified the cover of this guideline as Belma's, and I'm sure it's hers. It's just badly damaged. I will try to repair it with
alchemy.Would be willing to help me procure the materials? The materials needed for repairing the Guideline are two
pieces of Amor Seco Essence. You can buy it at the Item Shop or at the bazaar. You can also get Timeseer Weed Seeds by killing
<%sev_que_name0> in Tiplone Highlands and other places. I will prepare for alchemy here. Please come back when you have all the
materials.

230449.en:
You can get Timeseer Weed Seeds by defeating <%sev_que_name0> in Tiplone Highlands and so on. I will prepare for alchemy. Please come
back when you have all the materials.

230451.en:
Would you like to give Zef 2 Amor Seco Essence
and Timeseer Weed Seeds?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

230453.en:
<pc> gave Zef 2 Amor Seco Essence and
Timeseer Weed Seeds!

230455.en:
Zef carefully put Tattered Guidebook, Amor
Seco Essence, and Timeseer Weed Seeds into the
Alchemy Pot and began the smelting process.

230457.en:
What a wonderful restoration of the Tattered
Guidebook!<se System 7>

230459.en:
Thank you very much, Mr. Okkyu Zef is an adult and can do everything, but he is a little bit sad and lonely. That's why I'm very, very,
very happy to have the help of Mr. Okkyu! The two of you will do your best!

230461.en:
You will also need two Amor Seco Essence as materials for repairing the indexes. You can buy them at the Item Shop or at the bazaar. I
will proceed with the preparation of alchemy. Please come back when you have all the materials.

230463.en:
Welcome back . It seems that all the materials for the restoration have been gathered. Let's start the refining process
immediately.

230465.en:
Oops, is something wrong? I'm ready for the
alchemy, so please give me a call anytime.

230467.en:
The "youtade" is a kind of weed that grows in the plains, and its seeds can be used to make an excellent blue dye. However, it is time-
consuming to collect. When I need it in a hurry, like this time, I sometimes use the seeds attached to <%sev_que_name0>'s body. It
is a difficult material to handle for high- ranking alchemists, but it has been used since ancient times to dye the cover of the Time
Guidebook a noble blue color. The seeds will be sublimated through the medium of Amor Seco Essence for the final step. Go ahead,
transform!

230469.en:
Oops? It's not good. I didn't expect it to be in such bad shape. We have succeeded in restoring the damaged pages and reconstructing
the exterior, but the crucial text of the guidelines has been blurred. The guidelines, which are auto-penned in alchemical ink by
King Ethene when he conducts his inspection, are allowed to be reprinted if they have been severely damaged. If it is severely damaged,
it can be reprinted by Alchemy Pot with the approval of the king who created the document, that is, with the signature of King Domineus'
pen. If you have the guidelines, you may be able to go to the King's office if you have the guidelines at the Imperial
Plaza in Ethene Royal Palace, right? I will recondition the Alchemy Pot here. If you can find the King's signature, please bring it
with you.

ã€Œç§ã¯ã“ã“ã§ã€€éŒ¬é‡‘é‡œã‚’ã€€å†èª¿æ•´ã—ã¦ãŠãã¾ã™ã€‚ ã€€ã‚‚ã—ã€€å›½ç‹ç›´ç­†ã®ç½²åãŒã€€è¦‹ã¤ã‹ã£ãŸã‚‰ ã€€è¨˜è¼‰ã•ã‚ŒãŸç‰©ã”ã¨ã€€æŒã£ã¦ãã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

230471.en:
Ethene Royal Palace, if it's the King's office, is there anything left signed that I can get my hands on? I
will recondition the Alchemy Pot here. If you can find the King's signature in person, please bring it with you along with whatever
is listed.

230473.en:
Would you like to give Domineus' Memoir to
Zef?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

230477.en:
Zef placed the Domineus' Memoir and the
restored Guidance Book in the Alchemy Pot and
began smelting.

230479.en:
<pc> received Belma's Guidebook (Key
Item) and Domineus' Memoir!<me 60>

230481.en:
I've been waiting for you <pc>. Have
you found anything with the King's personal
signature on it?

230483.en:
I see. After all, as expected of
<pc>, this request is not easy.

230485.en:
How could the king's memoirs have been left behind? But this is a surprise. First of all, we need to restore the guidelines. Leave the
rest to me.

230487.en:
The alchemical technique of restoring the Guideline was only taught to a very limited number of alchemists belonging to the Royal
Alchemia. A person's pen contains a lot of information.We will follow in the footsteps of King Domineus' pen, carefully separating and
reintegrating the inscribed will into a guideline book. I will revive the book as it was in its earliest days. Now be transformed!
230487.ja:

230489.en:
SUCCESS. This time we have completely restored the guidelines to their original content. This is definitely Belma's guidebook. I will also
return to you the memoirs of King Domineus, which you used as a catalyst.

230491.en:
Is this also a curse?The information in the memoirs is vital to Belma. I am not qualified to judge whether or not you should show it to
her, or whether or not you should withhold it. But I believe that you can make the right decision, since you have made your own
decision to shape your future.
230491.ja:

230493.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Please, just go away. What do you want me to
do? I don't have any guidance. I don't know
anything. I don't want to do this anymore.

230495.en:
What is this?There is no doubt. It's my guidebook! I thought I lost it in the palace that day. Did you find it? Or did that
alchemist do it? No, I don't care which at this point. I'm sure I'll be able to find it! Thank you . The Time Guidebook is
dearer to me than life itself.
230495.ja:
ã€Œã“ã£â€¦ã“ã‚Œã¯ï¼ï¼Ÿ ã€€é–“é•ã„ãªã„ã€‚ç§ã®æŒ‡é‡æ›¸ã ï¼ ã€€ã‚ã®æ—¥ã€€ç‹å®®ã§ã€€ãªãã—ãŸã¯ãšã ãŒâ€¦â€¦ã€‚
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦è²´æ§˜ãŒã€€è¦‹ã¤ã‘ãŸã®ã‹ï¼Ÿ ã€€ãã‚Œã¨ã‚‚ã€€ã‚ã®éŒ¬é‡‘è¡“å¸«ã®ã—ã‚ã–ã‹ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã„ã‚„ã€€ã“ã®éš›ã€€ã©ã¡ã‚‰ã§ã‚‚æ§‹ã‚ãªã„ã€‚
ã€Œã‚ã‚â€¦â€¦ï¼ã€€æ„Ÿè¬ã™ã‚‹ã€€ã€‚ ã€€ç§ã«ã¨ã£ã¦ã€€æ™‚ã®æŒ‡é‡æ›¸ã¯ ã€€å‘½ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ã€€å¤§åˆ‡ãªã‚‚ã®ãªã®ã â€¦â€¦ã€‚

230499.en:
No, I don't need to tell you. I know you don't have to say it. I know you resent me for the magical creatures and the golden punishment.
Well, of course I do. In my dreams, as I wandered the depths of death, the grief and sorrow of so many of the people I'd mistreated
drove me to tears. And yet, I had nothing but the guidelines. But that's no excuse. Life according to the guidelines has been
fulfilling, but I'm a little tired. How will the new Ethene Kingdom change now that it has lost its guidelines? At the very least, I
would like to see where it goes. I'm sorry for causing you trouble. Please tell that to the good-natured alchemist. I'm fine now.

230501.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Hmm, am I supposed to read this book?A memoir?
Whose memoirs?

230505.en:
I am the daughter of Myrna mentioned here. My mother really loved my father. My father came here when I was born, but he was too busy with
his government affairs to spend much time with us. I used to cry a lot because I missed him so much. At times like that, my mother would
whisper to me, "Someday your father will come for you. Someday your father will come for you. That the guidelines would let me know the
first sign of his arrival. The guidelines were the only bond I had with my father. I waited for Michibiki's visit. Believing in a happy
future, I endured all kinds of suffering. But when my mother committed suicide and I became an orphan, my father did not come to pick me
up. As an adult, I followed the guidance of the guidelines and was appointed as a supervisor or a correctional officer, but in
the end, I was a miserable pawn to be discarded. But that was okay. I was happy that the guidelines were like my father's words
that were never spoken directly to me. And yet

230507.en:
Did you really find the guidelines? You went that far for her, even though we're enemies. If it's not too late, I'd like to apologize
for everything. I'm sorry for everything I've done to you. This is Belma's birthplace. I was a servant sent from the palace to take care of
Belma. I had my doubts about the duties of the Overseer of the Guidelines, which had been assigned to me since King Domineus ascended to
the throne, but Belma was willing to oblige. All I can say is, yes, Kunai, please deliver the guidelines to Belma as soon as possible.
Please.
230507.ja:

230509.en:
This house is Belma's birthplace. I was a servant sent from the palace to take care of Belma. I had my doubts about the duties of the
controller assigned to me since King Domineus took the throne, but Lady Belma was willing to oblige. All I can say is, yes, Kunai, please
deliver the guidelines to Belma as soon as possible. Please.

230511.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Ah, shit, shit! Why do I always have to go
through this? They're all pigs!

230513.en:
There you go again, you not-so-foolish pig. I'm under orders not to let you in the house. Did you find Lady Belma's guidebook? Huh?
Don't bullshit me. Get the hell out of here. Go back to your pig cabin!

230517.en:
<se System 35><pipipi_mid>What the hell, Grain? Okay, okay. Don't look
at me like that! I'm opening it right now,
damn it.

230519.en:
Would you like to give Belma the Time
Guidebook?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

230523.en:
Would you give Belma the memoirs of King
Domineus?<yesno_nc><break>

230527.en:
Belma read Domineus' Memoir with great
enthusiasm. After finishing it, she read it
again and again.

230529.en:
I am not qualified to judge whether I should show this to her along with the guidelines or not. However, I believe that you, who have
been carving out your own future, will be able to make the right decision.

230531.en:
As an orphan, Time Guidebook was the Only One Bond that guided me through life. Yes, even now. How will the new Ethene Kingdom, which
has lost its guidebook, change from now on? At the very least, I would like to see where it goes.

230533.en:
I thought the Time Guidebook was the only bond that could guide me through life. But it was all a lie. My father, who bound me to the
guidebook, is no more! I'm going to spend as much time as I need to get back the freedom he took from me. It's also a bad kunai to leave
the Royal City and broaden your horizons. You might see him again on your journey. Kukk. If you do, don't look the other way, okay?
230533.ja:
ã€Œæ™‚ã®æŒ‡é‡æ›¸ã¯ã€€äººç”Ÿã‚’ã¿ã¡ã³ã ã€€ãŸã£ãŸã²ã¨ã¤ã®ã€€çµ†ã ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ã„ãŸâ€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ã ãŒã€€ã™ã¹ã¦ã¯ã€€ã¾ã‚„ã‹ã—ã ã£ãŸã®ã ã€‚

230535.en:
I thank you. Now Belma will be able to regain her identity and walk away with a new life. I was ordered by the Minister of the time to
search for Belma, who went missing after her mother's death. I protected her when she was on the verge of becoming a cripple in Royal
Alchemia, and I have been protecting her since she was a little girl. Her life was hard and lonely. Although the state treasury paid for
her upkeep, King Domineus finally decided not to treat Belma as his daughter. State decrees no longer meant anything.I will protect Belma
with my own will. I want her to be unhappy, Kunai.
230535.ja:
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦æ„Ÿè¬ã™ã‚‹ã€‚ ã€€ã“ã‚Œã§ã€€ãƒ™ãƒ«ãƒæ§˜ã‚‚ã€€è‡ªåˆ†ã‚’å–ã‚Šæˆ»ã— ã€€æ–°ãŸãªäººç”Ÿã‚’ã€€æ­©ãã ã›ã‚‹ã ã‚ã†ã€‚

230537.en:
I needed money. Then my childhood friend, Grain, offered me a great job. He said I could clear all my debts by escorting a young lady
with a mysterious past. But this was a terrible trap. The young lady's true identity was so dangerous that once I got involved, it
was a job I'd never get out of! Grain knew that, and he told me about it. I ran away with the money once, but Grain caught me and turned
me into Bangers. Oh, man, I must've pulled a real piggyback!
230537.ja:
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ä¿ºã«ã¯ã€€é‡‘ãŒå¿…è¦ã ã£ãŸã€‚ ã€€ãã—ãŸã‚‰ã€€å¹¼ãªã˜ã¿ã®ã‚°ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒ³ãŒ ã€€ã„ã„ä»•äº‹ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã¨ã€€èª˜ã£ã¦ããŸã€‚

230539.en:
<pc> informed Zef that he had given
the guidelines and Belma's message.

230543.en:
<pc> gave Zef not only the guidelines
but also Domineus' Memoir and Belma's message.

230545.en:
Zef has been waiting for you for a long time!
How's your day going? Is it good? Let's report
it! Let's do it!

230547.en:
Welcome back <pc>. So how did it go
for you Belma?

230549.en:
I see. Even if it is not renewed, the existence of the guidelines has sustained Belma's heart. The sins committed will never
be erased. Still, we have to face reality and live with it. Believing that one day you will be forgiven. You don't need the memoir
anymore, do you? I will dispose of them in a proper manner, since it would be bad for them to be seen by the public.

230551.en:
Thank you very much for your cooperation. It's
not much, but here is our gratuity. Please
help us in our future travels.

230553.en:
It is a replica of the Time Guidebook. We were making a substitute in case we couldn't find Belma's guidebook. However, it is no longer
needed.Please accept it as a memorial.

230555.en:
I will continue to support Belma in her treatment and personal life so that she will not be lonely in the future. There are too few
people who know of her existence. If you would like, please visit when you feel like it.

230557.en:
Welcome back <pc>. So how did it go
for you Belma?

230559.en:
I see. I see. It's like her to try to live and win freedom even by feeding on hatred. Can I ask you about an old story? It's something
I've never told anyone in the store. I have known Belma for a long time.I don't think she remembers me, though. When I was a researcher
at Royal Alchemia, the director at the time, Dr. Jiden, was a career maniac who chose no means to achieve success. He was looking for
collaborators to help him complete his dream alchemical that would cure all diseases. So, he gathered children who had no parents. Belma
was one such child. I can't even put into words what I and my colleagues experienced there. Since Rev. Wagmika took over as
director, the inhumane acts have ceased, but that does not erase the fact that I was complicit in the crimes. That is why I took in
and raised the parentless children, Linka and Shante Luon, to make amends. I wanted to save Belma, too.

230561.en:
Thank you . You saved Belma, and you saved my heart as well. It's not much, but here is my gratuity. Please use it to help me
on my journey.

230565.en:
It is a replica of the Time Guidebook. We were making a substitute in case we couldn't find Belma's guidebook. However, it is no longer
needed.Please accept it as a memorial.

230567.en:
My redemption is not over.I will continue to support the young people who are the future of Ethene Kingdom. I am looking forward to seeing
what kind of future you, Belma, who received freedom, will envision. Let's hope it won't be too radical.

230569.en:
Chularis was born in Alchemia. It was created by Linka's father, Alteo, with Zef's help... That's why I remember a little bit. Those days
of Zef! I remember how tense he was with Ellie all the time. I guess he's a lot happier now that he's an old man and living with everyone!
Of course, Chularis is happy too!

230571.en:
I will continue to treat her and keep an eye on her so that she will not become more lonely in the future. There are too few people who
know of her existence. If you would like, please visit whenever you feel like it.

230573.en:
My redemption is not over.I will continue to support the young people who are the future of Ethene Kingdom. I am looking forward to seeing
what kind of future you, Belma, who received freedom, will envision. Let's hope it won't be too radical.

230575.en:
Well... I can't do much more than chat with you if you come in here like this, but if you still want to chat, please do as you please. I
recently heard the news of the death of a friend of mine.As I'm sure you already know, Faras passed away.

234228.en:
There is a sturdy-looking wardrobe. It seems
to be locked.

234230.en:
It was a sturdy-looking piece of furniture with a large door. The door did not open even after entering the code. It seems that I
cannot go to Royal Alchemia from the current Royal City Kimbel.

234232.en:
The lanterns may have malfunctioned during the time travel to the present day, but they did not start up. It seems that the lantern in the
present Royal City Kimbel does not allow us to go to the mysterious house of illusion.

234239.en:
<turn_pc>I'm sorry. I was in an accident a while ago
and my memory is still not clear.

234241.en: <attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>My head! What the hell happened back there?

234243.en:
Thank you ! Actually, I have an idea about the pendant.The person who rescued me is a soldier in this country named Elshido.
So, if you go to Army Headquarters and talk to Elshido, he might know something about the pendant!
234243.ja:

234245.en:
Thank you You have a lot of favors to ask of me! I'm sorry, but I can't ask any more favors from such a busy person.
Please come back when you are lighter.

234247.en:
I see. I guess I'll just have to wait for the
injury to heal. I don't know when that will
be.

234249.en:
I used to live in a place called Rinjahar, a maritime city, and as you know, that disaster happened. I was lucky to be rescued, although
I was badly injured, but due to the shock, I can't remember anything that happened before and after the disaster. The only thing I
remember is that I had a precious pendant with me, but I lost it. So . Please, can you help me find my precious pendant?

234257.en:
<turn_pc>The man who transported me from Rinjahar to
Royal City was a soldier named Elshido.<open_irai><bw_break>

234265.en:
<turn_pc>Ah <pc>! Have you talked to Elshido
about the pendant I lost?

234267.en:
I see. If you can talk to Elshido at Army
Headquarters, please let me know!

234269.en:
Thank you! Is this the Bread Fret? Rinjahal Restoration Music Festival? Our guest is the Flower Diva from Ethene Kingdom. Held at the
Rinjahar Grand Theatre.

234271.en:
That's right! I remember now! I was in charge of this music festival! I even invited a famous singer. A lovely and very kind young
lady named Shante. She was very kind to us, the organizers. But in the middle of the festival, Rinjahar was hit by a disaster. She
was right in front of me! Oh! I also remembered that I had lost my precious pendant near the Rinjahar Grand Theatre. So, if you
look around the theater, you may be able to find the pendant. It is a pendant with a beryl stone. The building may have been destroyed
during the disaster, but the Grand Theater was on the east side of Rinja Tower.

234273.en:
Would you like to give Regul the Music
Festival Pamphlet?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

234275.en:
<pc> gave Regul the Music Festival
Pamphlet he received from Elshido!

234277.en:
<turn_pc>While I was busy preparing for the festival, I
lost my precious pendant near the Rinjahal
Grand Theater.<open_irai><bw_break>

234279.en:
<turn_pc>Ah <pc>. If I may ask, did you find
my precious pendant?

234281.en:
Is that so? I would appreciate it if you could
help me with the pendant.

234283.en:
<icon_exc>This is a beryl stone! It's a little beat up,
but it's definitely my pendant! Ah! Yes, I
remember now.<bw_break>

234285.en:
I used to work for Rinjara, the mayor of the maritime city of Rinjahar. Although he is young, Rinjara is very talented, well-liked by
the citizens, and a truly wonderful person. That is why . Actually, this pendant is the key to my archives in Rinjahar.
If you fit the beryl stone of this pendant into the small hollow in the door, it unlocks the archives. There is a Memory Crystal tucked
away in the archives, so could you please fetch it for me? I'll leave the pendant with you.

234287.en:
I'm sorry to keep repeating myself, but thank
you for your patience. My archives should be
in the building southwest of Rinja Tower.

234289.en: Would you like me to give you Regul's Pendant?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

234295.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr><turn_pc>Thank you for everything. Thanks to you, I
remember everything.<open_irai><bw_break>

234297.en:
Dear Mayor Rinjara of Rinjahar, a friendly city of Ethene Kingdom. I have something to tell you. My brother Padre is a man of great
talent, but he is also arrogant and arrogant to the point of arrogance. Even you, my old friend, look down on him. Moreover, that
foolish brother, driven by ambition, has been plotting to take Rinjahar away from you. Taking advantage of Rinjahar's crisis, he went
all the way to sell his favors to you, which is the first step in his scheme. Such an outrage should not be tolerated! As the head
of Rinjahar, you must take immediate action!

234299.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Oh. What a surprise. It's too late for
everything.

234301.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Was that so? But he is no longer with us. No,
nothing.

234303.en:
Oh. Thank you. It's old, but it's definitely that crystal. But it's all too late. While you were retrieving the crystals, I was told that
Master Rinjara had already passed away. I suppose it was out of concern for the people of this country. I was not told of Rinjahar's
demise until today.

234305.en:
After receiving the Memory Crystal, I began to notice disturbing incidents of people in Rinjahar craning their necks. So I took the
crystal from Rinjara's office and checked its contents. I hid the Memory Crystal in the archives so that Rinjara would not be
suspected of having anything to do with the disappearances. He was truly a kind, wise, and wonderful person. But I never thought that
Rinjahar had already been destroyed and Rinjara-sama had passed away! Ah. I'm sure that Domineus-sama's words have corroded
Rinjara-sama's heart. If only I had had the courage to ask Rinjara about the truth. If only I had the courage to ask Rinjara about
the truth, such a tragedy could have been avoided. I have caused you a lot of trouble this time because of me. This is my
apology at least.

234307.en:
This sin is so serious that I may never be able to atone for it in my own life, but as someone who was close to the truth of that
catastrophe, I am determined to find a way to atone for it, even if it takes the rest of my life.

234309.en: Would you like to give Regul's Memory Crystal?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

234313.en:
When Regul raised the Memory Crystal, a three-
dimensional image of Domineus appeared!

234317.en:
I am sorry for all the trouble I have caused you this time. Master Rinjara was a sensitive person, but he was passionate
about his work and a wonderful person who served his people well. I just couldn't bear the thought of such a person being suspected
of a crime and having his honor tarnished. If only I had had the courage to face the truth, such a tragedy could have been avoided and
Rinjara-sama might not have died. My sins are too serious, but as someone who was close to the true fruit of that catastrophe, I would
like to atone for them, even if it takes the rest of my life. When I recover from this injury, I will go to Alltrades Abbey and pray
everyday for those who lost their lives.

235175.en:
Hey there, travelers! I, a Kimbel connoisseur, have some good information about the Royal City. Oh? You've got a question you want to
ask me, right? That's fine. Ask me anything.

235177.en: Oops. I guess I was wrong. That's too bad.

235179.en:
Have you seen Timeseer's Key around here? Hmmm. I've only seen keys in my own house recently. I did see a boy being scolded by his
mother for going near the Eternal Ring, though. I'm sorry I only have this kind of information.

235181.en:
With the palace gone, we won't be able to see the time, and the guidelines will probably never be updated again. It's disturbing not
knowing what the future holds for our children.

235183.en:
From now on, instead of writing guidelines, I, as a parent, have to listen carefully to what she wants to do and what her dreams are for
the future.Hmm? Is there something you want to ask me?

235187.en:
Me, me, me! When I'm big, I'm going to go around the world on a boat, and I'm going to try once! Then maybe I'll meet the little boy
whose mouth is called "Cu-cu-cu" again! Cu-cu- cu-cu~! What's that? Do you have something you want to ask me?Me, me, me! When I'm big, I'm going to go around the world on a boat, and I'm going to try once! Then maybe I'll meet the little boy
whose mouth is called "Cu-cu-cu" again! Cu-cu- cu-cu~! What's that? Is there something you want to ask me?

235191.en:
A key for you? I don't really know, but I found a sparkling one at the school! I set an example for my mom. I set my example to my
mom, and then a woman from the department store came by. She said she wanted it. And then... She gave the glitter to the woman.
Then she offered me a toy!

235193.en:
Listen to this! Mereade-sama came to the store for the first time in a while and bought some cat goods! Even though he's so busy. No, no,
no! I guess it's because he's so busy that he needs the ultimate comfort of cats! Oh, I'm sorry. It seems you have something for me. You
have a question?
235193.ja:

235195.en: Oh, I see. If that's the case, that's fine.

235197.en:
Did I not buy the golden key from Oriza? Yes, I did, but I'm sorry. It's not here anymore. The Item Shop from Freedom Village. Wasikov, I
think his name is? I remember he bargained hard to buy them. He said he was pleased that they would be the highlight of his store, so
if we hurry, they might still be in the store. You can get to the village from Tiplone Highlands.

235199.en:
I don't really know what your secret is, but I found something sparkling at the Eikyu-jikan! I set an example for my mom. I set my example
to my mom, and then a woman from the department store came by. She said she wanted it. And then... She gave the glitter to the
woman. Then she offered me a toy!

235201.en:
Mr. Wasikov of Item Shop, who came from Freedom Village to buy the golden key, bargained hard and bought it. He was pleased
that it would be a highlight of his store, so if you hurry, you might still be able to find it in his store. You can get to the village
from Tiplone Highlands.

235203.en:
Oh, you. Looks like you got the golden key. I
hope it was something important. I'm sorry. I
should have checked the source.
235203.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã‚‰ã€€ã‚ãªãŸã¯â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ã©ã†ã‚„ã‚‰ã€€é‡‘è‰²ã®ã‚«ã‚®ã¯ã€€æ‰‹ã«å…¥ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ã­ã€‚
ã€Œä½•ã‹ã€€å¤§åˆ‡ãªã‚‚ã®ã ã£ãŸã®ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã€‚ ã€€ã”ã‚ã‚“ãªã•ã„ã­ã€‚å‡ºã©ã“ã‚ã‚’ ã€€ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã¨ã€€ç¢ºèªã—ã¦ãŠãã¹ãã ã£ãŸã‚ã€‚

235205.en:
<if_woman><attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Huh? Isn't that sparkle I found the other day
the onee-chan is holding?<bw_break><else><attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Huh? Isn't that sparkle I found the other day
the one you're holding?<bw_break><endif>

235207.en:
<if_woman><attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>That's what you were looking for, right, girl?
I'm glad you found it!<else><attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>You were looking for it, weren't you? I'm glad
you found it!<endif>

235209.en:
We have learned from the statement issued the other day that His Majesty Quard's will has been succeeded by Mr. Mereade. Let us
alchemists do our part to help the kingdom move toward a new future. That is the best way to present to His Majesty Quard.

235211.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>I was surprised to hear that His Majesty Quard
had passed away. I knew that the wound at that
time was fatal.

235213.en:
When I heard that His Majesty Quard had passed away, I thought that this country was finished for good, but Mereade's words have given me
hope.

235215.en:
I heard from Mr. Mereade. I guess the guidelines will never be updated again. From now on, instead of the policy book, I, as a
parent, will have to listen carefully to what she wants to do and what her dreams are for the future and try to find out what she wants
to do.

235217.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Mereade-sama is going to be even busier from
now on, isn't she? I hope the cat goods we buy
for you will help to ease your mind.

236969.en: There is an ordinary Alchemy Pot.

236971.en:
There is a unique looking Alchemy Pot. This
seems to be the effect of the Alchemy Pot
prism created by Neroli.

236989.en:
<pc> looked over a letter from
Wagmika addressed to Director Yong.

236991.en:
Rumors of its appearance in Bantryu Region have reached Freedom Village. Even after I resigned in protest and left Royal Alchemia,
you continued that abominable research, didn't you? Most likely, he was offered the position of warden, so he continued his research. You
snobby bastard! I won't say anything bad about it. Destroy all the materials related to it immediately and never touch that research
again! Those who continue this forbidden research will surely be dealt a painful blow one day. From Wagmika

237504.en:
The other day, we received a call from the headquarters of the World Association of Innkeepers and we have decided to start a
service called "Special Lottery! We hope that you will take advantage of this service. See you soon!

237607.en:
I make my living as a writer. I was on a trip to Lendersia to look for stories, and when I heard about Ethene, I came all the way across
the sea. I never thought that there is a place where the rare pot smelter is so deeply rooted in people's daily lives! It is good to travel
once in a while, isn't it? I think I will be able to find a good story.

237609.en:
I make my living as a writer. I was on a trip to Lendersia to look for stories, and when I heard about Ethene, I came all the way across
the sea. I felt my life was in danger when my ship was wrecked on the way, but it was a good decision to come! I never thought that there
is a land where kettle smelting, which is rare nowadays, is so deeply rooted in people's daily lives! It's too wonderful! And yet,
Ethene is too little known! Don't you think more people should know about this wonderful place?

237611.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>What? It's so sad that there are people who
don't understand this charm.

237613.en:
I know, right? I know you think so too! I've decided to write a book about this place in order to spread the word about it! I'm doing a
lot of research for the book, but if it's okay with you, I'd like to ask you to help me with my research. Let's spread the charm of Ethene
together!

237615.en:
Really! Thank you very much! Hmmm...your name is , isn't it? To tell the truth, my legs and back have been so painful due to
the vast amount of coverage I've already done that I've honestly reached my limit. Let's work hard together, shall we? I would like to
talk to you about the target of the interview, so please talk to me again when you are ready.

237617.en:
Really! Thank you very much! But it seems you are busy with other things. If you have time, please give me a call again. I'll just accept
your kindness for now.

237619.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I see. I'm sorry to hear that. If you change
your mind, please come again.

237621.en:
Oh ! I'd like you to go and talk to three people who are involved with kettle smelting! The first is a woman who sells
alchemized flowers there. I would be happy if you could ask her how alchemized flowers are different from ordinary flowers, and how they
are appreciated by people! The second one is Dwighty, who often rants about how she is going to be an alchemist! She is a Dwarf woman
who often rants about how she is going to be an alchemist! Since she seems to have such a true sword, she must have an extraordinary
passion for pot smelting! We would love to interview her! The third person is a man who is cooking in the kitchen of the store of the
man with glasses! Please ask him about the benefits of cooking alchemy! Please ask him about the benefits of Culinary Arts!

237623.en:
Come on, come on! How about some fresh flowers? We have a wide variety of colorful flowers grown freely in the rich water of
Ethene. There is no guideline for which flowers to buy, you are free to choose the one you like best. We recommend the alchemy blue
roses!

237625.en:
Sir, you want to ask me about alchemy roses? These roses are great! They're made by kettle smelting, so they last longer and have better
color! Look at the color and luster! Ordinary roses don't have this kind of luster! What do you think? Would you like to buy one?

237627.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh, you mean you want to check the information
again about the people I asked you to cover?<yesno><break>

237629.en:
If you ever want to check, feel free to let me
know!

237631.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Yes, I am! These are the people we are asking
<pc> to interview!

237633.en:
I would like you to go and talk to the woman who sells flowers there. I heard that she sells alchemically finished flowers, but I
would be happy if you could ask her how they are different from ordinary flowers and how they are appreciated by everyone!

237635.en: Now, who would you like to know about next?

237637.en:
I'm going to be an alchemist! She is a Dwarf woman who often rants about how she is going to become an alchemist! Since she seems to
have such a true sword, it is obvious that she has an extraordinary passion for pot smelting! She is walking in the northwest direction, so
please follow her for an interview!

237639.en:
The man with the glasses who is always cooking in the kitchen of the restaurant! I heard that he cooks using alchemy! I bet the food he
cooks must be delicious. Please ask him about the advantages of cooking alchemy!

237641.en:
When you have finished your interview, let's meet up here! There is no information as realistic as the voices of residents who
actually live in the area! Please go and tell us your wonderful stories!

237643.en:
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! Listen, YOU!Royal Alchemia is gone and there's a shortage of alchemists! This is your chance to make it
big!I'll become an alchemist and turn stones into gold to help the treasury of Ethene Kingdom!

237645.en:
The charm of kettle smelting! There are so many of them, aren't there? You can turn rocks into gold and accept it! You can make medicine
and heal the injured! The possibilities are endless once you master kettle alchemy! You'll be able to live freely in any way you like!

237657.en:
Would you like to interview Eneola, who sells
alchemical flowers?<yesno><case 1><close><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

237659.en: Would you like to interview Terence?<yesno><case 1><close><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

237661.en:
Now that things have finally settled down in Royal City, I'd like to resume picking wild vegetables in the Tiplone Highlands. Fresh
ingredients are the key to cooking and refining! Maybe I should take Luon with me. What a whim that little brat has been coming
out of his room!

237663.en:
Whoa? What is it? What is it? You suddenly asked me a very complicated question! Yes, I did. If you use the kettle smelting technique,
even the tough meat in a stew that hasn't been simmered long enough can be tenderized in no time at all! And if you are skilled, you can
keep the food warm forever. In other words, if you have kettle alchemy, any kind of cooking is possible!

237665.en:
Ah ! I see you've done an interview with everyone! I just got back from the interview myself. I just got back from the
interview!

237671.en:
<pc> reported the results of the
interview to Kajinoki!

237673.en:
Kajinoki raised his ude high and tried to
stretch wide!

237675.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Ouch!I never thought I would suffer from an
unexpected hip injury at a time like this. I
guess I was too tired from the interview.<open_irai><bw_break>

237677.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr><pc> Excuse me, but could you please
get me some medicine from a grandma alchemist
who is reputed to have good udes. Please.

237679.en:
Yes? We're full up with clients. I can't
accept a walk-in request.

237681.en:
Hmm? You came to get the medicine for that little scribbler? Unfortunately, his medicine isn't ready yet. They are made according to
the order of reservations. But you want the medicine as soon as possible, don't you? Then, you can help me a little, can't you? If you
do, I'll make them for you on a priority basis. I just need you to get me a little bit of the materials I need. For smelting, I need
a material called Butterfly Scales from <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>. Go get them for me. I'll be waiting with other materials. But that boy is
so young, he must be suffering from an acute hip.

<pc> informed Kajinoki that he had
come to pick up the medicine at his request!

237685.en:
You can get the materials from <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> around here. I'll be waiting here. But that kid, I can't believe he has an
accident. He's still young.

237687.en: Oh, did you get the Butterfly Scales?

237689.en:
What, you haven't done it yet? We're already
ready.

237691.en: All right then, let's make some medicine.

237695.en: Would you give Butterfly Scales to Merkel?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

237699.en:
Merkel took the blackened liquid and put it in
an Alchemy Pot with Butterfly Scales to begin
the process.<se S4_FOR1_001 0><bw_break>

237701.en:
After a while, the liquid turned blue in
color.

237705.en: <attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Oh, my God, I can't move, it hurts too much.

237707.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><icon_exc>Ha! This voice is <pc>! Did you bring
me the medicine by any chance?

237709.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Oh, I didn't know you hadn't come in yet. I'll
be waiting here for a long time, so please
take care of the medicine.

237711.en:
Oh, the pain has subsided! This is it! The power of the kettle alchemy! The power! I'm so thrilled to be able to experience it
firsthand~! Now I can finally get to work on my obsession! Thank you so much for not only cooperating with the interview, but also for
bringing the medicine!

237713.en:
Eh? Did grandma say that to you? I'm so happy! I'm going to have to get good at this! But still, to be able to make such an amazing
medicine, the power of kettle smelting is really great, isn't it? I had heard that Ethene Village had recently been restored, so
I had imagined a simpler place, but in fact, it has developed into such a large city that it is no longer a village, but a town, or even
a city beyond a town! I wonder if this is a result of the fact that kettle smelting has taken root in the area. Well, seeing is
believing. I will definitely write a good book and try my best to convey the charm of this Ethene Village to many people!

237715.en:
Go on, give it to the kid as soon as you can.
And don't forget to tell him to give me a copy
when you're done.

237717.en:
Would you like to put Hustle Cloth on
Kajinoki?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

237721.en:
<pc> passed Merkel's message on to
Kajinoki.

237723.en:
I will definitely write a good book and do my best to convey the charm of Ethene Village to many people! By the way, I heard during the
interview that pot smelting is also very advanced in the city of Royal City Kimbel! It is located in Kunai, not far from Ethene
Village, so I am thinking of going there next time to do an interview.

240088.en:
Hello, my name is Regul. My name is Regul. I see that you are . You seem to be well traveled. I have a favor to ask of
someone as well-traveled as you. Please just listen to what I have to say. I used to live in a place called Rinjahar, a maritime city,
but as you know, that disaster happened. I was lucky to be rescued, although I was badly injured, but due to the shock, I can't
remember anything that happened before and after the disaster. The only thing I remember is that I lost my pendant, which was supposed
to be very important to me. I really want to look for the pendant right away, but my injury is still not completely healed. So
. Please, can you help me find my precious pendant?
